channel.title: Welchscape and eyrescape client startup prob!
channel.description:
so whenever i try to log into welchscape it says "ecseption in tread "main" java.lang NoClassDEfFoundError: client press any key to continue" heres code in run client:[code] @echo off COLOR 05 TITLE Welshscape Client java -Xmx500m client pause
but code in diff order. with eyrescape it says same thing ecsept instead of client it says EGUI heres code:TITLE EyreScape- By Skating On Java @ECHO OFF CD files
:info CLS ECHO EyreScape! ECHO By Skating On Java ECHO ---- ECHO Type 1 to start the EyreScape GUI. ECHO Type 2 To read the Readme ECHO Type x to Exit. SET option= ECHO. SET /p option= So What do you choose? if %option%==1 goto runclient if %option%==x exit if %option%==2 goto readme
:runclient CLS JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE CLS GOTO info
:readme CLS echo Go to the place where i posted this attachment and echo download the other one called .file_store_32 ... echo it will not work untill you have got that echo and placed it in a file called CACHE! echo ---------------------------------------------------- echo ...THEN compile all the java files. echo ----------------------------------------------------
PAUSE GOTO info
so if you have any idea how to fix plz post :D [/code]

item.title: Welchscape and eyrescape client startup prob!
item.dc:creator: @jar10010 jar10010
item.description:
@jar10010 wrote:

so whenever i try to log into welchscape it says “ecseption in tread “main” java.lang NoClassDEfFoundError: client press any key to continue” heres code in run client:[code] @echo off
COLOR 05
TITLE Welshscape Client
java -Xmx500m client
pause

but code in diff order.
with eyrescape it says same thing ecsept instead of client it says EGUI heres code:TITLE EyreScape- By Skating On Java
@ECHO OFF
CD files

:info
CLS
ECHO EyreScape!
ECHO By Skating On Java
ECHO ----
ECHO Type 1 to start the EyreScape GUI.
ECHO Type 2 To read the Readme
ECHO Type x to Exit.
SET option=
ECHO.
SET /p option= So What do you choose?
if %option%==1 goto runclient
if %option%==x exit
if %option%==2 goto readme

:runclient
CLS
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE
CLS
GOTO info

:readme
CLS
echo Go to the place where i posted this attachment and
echo download the other one called .file_store_32 …
echo it will not work untill you have got that
echo and placed it in a file called CACHE!
echo ----------------------------------------------------
echo …THEN compile all the java files.
echo ----------------------------------------------------

PAUSE
GOTO info

so if you have any idea how to fix plz post
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Welchscape and eyrescape client startup prob!
